short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is intended to be used with CoStar Real Estate Manager to translate generic field names with specific ones.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is provided for exclusive use by employees and partners of Jones Lang LaSalle Inc. (JLL)
This extension is intended to translate generic user defined field names in JLL's  CoStar Real Estate Manager implementation to client specific ones. 
This extension overcomes a technical limitation on the application which prevents multi-tenant configuration.
